title: Flight booking and London hotel recommendations
user_intent: Book a flight and explore hotel options for a trip to London.
what_we_did: Confirmed and booked a flight from JFK to LHR for October 15th to October 22nd.
Provided two boutique hotel recommendations in London's West End within the specified budget.
Offered detailed information for 'The Z Hotel Piccadilly'.
what_worked: Successfully identified and booked the desired flight based on user's criteria.
Found hotel options that matched user's style (boutique), location (West End), and budget preferences.
constraints: Flight: New York (JFK) to London (LHR), October 15th - October 22nd.
Hotel: Boutique style, £150-£200 per night, close to West End.
next_steps: User to decide on hotel booking for London trip.
instructions_for_next_model: Follow up with the user regarding their hotel decision for the London trip.
Be prepared to book 'The Z Hotel Piccadilly' or 'Hotel Indigo London - Leicester Square' if requested.
Offer to search for alternative hotel options if the current recommendations are not suitable.
